name: Peanut Butter & Jelly, Inc.
description: Peanut Butter & Jelly, Inc. is a unique food company focused on producing high-quality, organic peanut butter and jelly products. Founded in 2010, the company has rapidly gained a reputation for its commitment to using only the finest ingredients, sourced from sustainable farms. PBJA's flagship products include a range of flavored peanut butters, such as honey-roasted and dark chocolate, alongside a variety of artisanal jams and jellies, made from real fruit without any preservatives. The company's mission is to provide delicious, nutritious, and convenient meal options that appeal to families and health-conscious consumers alike. PBJA is dedicated to promoting healthy eating habits, and part of its profits goes towards supporting local food banks and nutrition education programs. With a focus on innovation, PBJA continually explores new flavor combinations and product lines, including nut-free alternatives and vegan options. The company’s commitment to sustainability is evident in its eco-friendly packaging and community initiatives that support local farmers and reduce waste. As PBJA expands its presence in the market, it aims to become a household name synonymous with quality and taste in the food industry.

seo.meta_title: Peanut Butter & Jelly, Inc. | Organic Peanut Butter and Jams
seo.meta_description: Discover Peanut Butter & Jelly, Inc., a leader in organic peanut butter and artisanal jams. Explore our delicious products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What products does PBJA offer?
faq.answer: PBJA offers a range of organic peanut butters and artisanal jams and jellies.

faq.question: Where is PBJA headquartered?
faq.answer: PBJA is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Is PBJA committed to sustainability?
faq.answer: Yes, PBJA is dedicated to sustainability, using eco-friendly packaging and supporting local farmers.
